about_the_game:
Introduction


Coin Factory is a relaxing money-making game where you'll embark on a journey to wealth. Combine and level up factories, explore numerous synergies at your own pace, and unlock multiple tiers of buildings. Compete in daily challenge levels with exclusive bonus buildings, adding a special flavor to your experience.

Community


Join us on our Discord to share your strategies and highlights! Our team values your ideas and feedback; we aim for Coin Factory to provide a great relaxing experience for everybody.

Gameplay


Start by planning your strategy and placing your output tile. This tile will receive all the money you make and make it available for you to buy upgrades and new tiles.



From here, it's all about building up! Level up your factories and place better modifier factories to enhance your production. Discover the best matches and uncover secrets that will give you an advantage!



Have doubts about a tile? Visit the tutorial screen and explore the different tile usages in the Tile Gallery.

Special Levels


Play hand-made levels and explore the Daily and Nightly challenge levels every new day. Each new daily level comes with different modifiers that will test your strategies. Discover new combinations of tiles to elevate your game to the next level!

Buildings


  • Factory
  • Central
  • Accelerator
  • Park
  • Overclocker
  • Investor
  • Jumper
  • Belt
  • Firecamp
  • Drums
  • Bishop
  • Casino
  • Water
  • Bitcoin
  • Portals
  • More...

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Coin Factory

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 @ 3.2 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to Coin Factory. Build your first coin maker factory and explore the different synergies and combinations. Level up your buildings and become the ultimate money maker. Strategize and plan ahead. Unlock new buildings and compete in the global leaderboard!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil
